page.title: 05A DAY IN MY LIFE.NEIL COY.
page.content: EIGHT O'CLOCK.MUM WOKE ME.I STUMBLED DOWNSTAIRS AND ATE MY OAT KRUNCHIES AND DRANK MY ORANGE JUICE.AFTERWARDS I WASHED,CLEANED MY TEETH THEN HAD A GAME OF ASTRO WARS.AT 8.30 AM I WENT TO OPEN THE GARAGE DOORS.AT 8.45 AM MUM ARRIVED AT SCHOOL.I WENT IN AND STARTED PLAYING "BOOGA BUSTERS" WITH SOME FRIENDS. MRS BROOM RANG THE BELL AND WE WENT IN TO DO SOME MATHS.AT PLAYTIME WE PLAYED "BOOGA BUSTERS" AGAIN.THEN WE CHECKED OUR SPELLINGS AND DID SOME WRITING ABOUT ST.MARYS CHURCH. AFTER DINNER IT WAS RAINING SO I STAYED IN THE CLASSROOM WITH ROBERT DRAWING PICTURES.AFTER DINNER WE LISTENED TO A RADIO PLAY AND DID SOME MORE WORK.AT 3 PM I WENT HOME AND WATCHED T.V.AT 6.30 I WENT TO CUBS WHERE I RECEIVED MY HOME HELP BADGE.AT 8 PM (WHEN I GOT HOME)I WATCHED T.V. THEN I WENT TO BED.
